Sql.query: select * from vw_eq_area order by areanomb asc
select * from trn_area where (areanombre like '%' + :areanombre + '%' or :areanombre is null) order by areanomb asc
select a.areacodi, a.areanomb from si_area a WHERE a.areacodi > 0 order by a.areanomb asc
select distinct a.areacodi, a.areanomb from si_area a inner join aud_proceso p on a.areacodi = p.areacodi WHERE a.areacodi > 0 and p.procactivo = '1' order by a.areanomb asc
